options.label: Great War-Bear - Claws (A3, AP(1)), Fear, Impact(3), Swift, Tough(+3)

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 1 die, on a 2+ it takes 3 hits with AP(1).
specialRules.name: Attack Bomb
specialRules.label: Attack Bomb
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 1 die, on a 2+ it takes 3 hits with AP(1).

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one friendly Artillery unit within 6”, which may either get +2 to its shooting rolls or move up to 6” during its next activation.
specialRules.name: Ballistic Master
specialRules.label: Ballistic Master
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one friendly Artillery unit within 6”, which may either get +2 to its shooting rolls or move up to 6” during its next activation.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 3 dice, for each 2+ it takes 3 hits with AP(1).
specialRules.name: Bombing Run
specialRules.label: Bombing Run
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 3 dice, for each 2+ it takes 3 hits with AP(1).

specialRules.hint: The unit may be deployed from Ambush at up to 3” from enemy units.
specialRules.name: Drill
specialRules.label: Drill
specialRules.description: The unit may be deployed from Ambush at up to 3” from enemy units.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get +1 to their rolls when fighting in melee.
specialRules.name: Grudge
specialRules.label: Grudge
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get +1 to their rolls when fighting in melee.

specialRules.hint: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.
specialRules.name: Slayer
specialRules.label: Slayer
specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.hint: The hero may ignore the Slow rule.
specialRules.name: Swift
specialRules.label: Swift
specialRules.description: The hero may ignore the Slow rule.

spells.name: Spite Rune
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to hit in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Smiting Rune
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Battle Rune
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +6” next time it moves.

spells.name: Breaking Rune
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Drill Rune
spells.effect: Target piece of terrain within 6” may be moved by up to 6” in any direction or may be removed from play.

spells.name: Cleaving Rune
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 12” take 6 automatic hits each.
